languages.text: "Благодарю, что были к нему {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}строги{/d}. Другие медикарии усвоили на примере Мариуса, что надо работать, а не отвлекать Лорд-капитана глупыми фантазиями".

"I appreciate that you were {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}strict{/d} with him. Marius's example has taught the other medicae officers that their responsibility is to focus on their work, not distract the Lord Captain with inane fantasies."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, что были к нему {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}строги{/d}. Другие медикарии усвоили на примере Мариуса, что надо работать, а не отвлекать Лорд-капитана глупыми фантазиями".

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate that you were strict with him. Marius's example has taught the other medicae officers that their responsibility is to focus on their work, not distract the Lord Captain with inane fantasies."

languages.text: "Ich begrüße es, dass Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}streng{/d} mit ihm verfahren seid. Marius' Beispiel hat die anderen Medicae-Offiziere gelehrt, dass sie die Pflicht haben, sich auf ihre Arbeit zu konzentrieren, anstatt den Lord Captain mit abstrusen Fantasien abzulenken."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate that you were {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}strict{/d} with him. Marius's example has taught the other medicae officers that their responsibility is to focus on their work, not distract the Lord Captain with inane fantasies."

traits.locale_text: "Ich begrüße es, dass Ihr streng mit ihm verfahren seid. Marius' Beispiel hat die anderen Medicae-Offiziere gelehrt, dass sie die Pflicht haben, sich auf ihre Arbeit zu konzentrieren, anstatt den Lord Captain mit abstrusen Fantasien abzulenken."

"Ich begrüße es, dass Ihr streng mit ihm verfahren seid. Marius' Beispiel hat die anderen Medicae-Offiziere gelehrt, dass sie die Pflicht haben, sich auf ihre Arbeit zu konzentrieren, anstatt den Lord Captain mit abstrusen Fantasien abzulenken."

languages.text: « Je vous sais gré de la {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}rigueur{/d} dont vous avez fait preuve envers lui. L'exemple de Marius a servi de leçon aux autres officiers de la medicae : ils ont bien compris que leur devoir est de se concentrer sur leur travail, et non pas d'importuner {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avec leurs caprices ridicules. »
languages.original_text: "I appreciate that you were {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}strict{/d} with him. Marius's example has taught the other medicae officers that their responsibility is to focus on their work, not distract the Lord Captain with inane fantasies."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous sais gré de la rigueur dont vous avez fait preuve envers lui. L'exemple de Marius a servi de leçon aux autres officiers de la medicae : ils ont bien compris que leur devoir est de se concentrer sur leur travail, et non pas d'importuner {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avec leurs caprices ridicules. »

« Je vous sais gré de la rigueur dont vous avez fait preuve envers lui. L'exemple de Marius a servi de leçon aux autres officiers de la medicae : ils ont bien compris que leur devoir est de se concentrer sur leur travail, et non pas d'importuner {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avec leurs caprices ridicules. »

languages.text: «Agradezco que se mostrase {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}{mf|estricto|estricta}{/d} con él. Marius ha servido como ejemplo para que los demás oficiales de medicae comprendan que su responsabilidad es centrarse en el trabajo en lugar de molestar {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán con absurdas fantasías».
languages.original_text: "I appreciate that you were {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}strict{/d} with him. Marius's example has taught the other medicae officers that their responsibility is to focus on their work, not distract the Lord Captain with inane fantasies."

traits.locale_text: «Agradezco que se mostrase {mf|estricto|estricta} con él. Marius ha servido como ejemplo para que los demás oficiales de medicae comprendan que su responsabilidad es centrarse en el trabajo en lugar de molestar {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán con absurdas fantasías».

languages.text: 「彼に{d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}厳しく接して{/d}くださったこと、感謝します。マリウスの例は、他のメディケア士官たちに、自分たちの責務は仕事に集中することであり、無意味な妄想でロード・キャプテンを煩わすことではないということを教えてくれました」
languages.original_text: "I appreciate that you were {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}strict{/d} with him. Marius's example has taught the other medicae officers that their responsibility is to focus on their work, not distract the Lord Captain with inane fantasies."

traits.locale_text: 「彼に厳しく接してくださったこと、感謝します。マリウスの例は、他のメディケア士官たちに、自分たちの責務は仕事に集中することであり、無意味な妄想でロード・キャプテンを煩わすことではないということを教えてくれました」

languages.text: “我很感激您对他的{d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}严{/d}格要求。马吕斯的事情给其他船医树立了榜样，大家都意识到自己的职责是专心工作，而不是天天胡说八道，分散舰长大人的注意力。”
languages.original_text: "I appreciate that you were {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}strict{/d} with him. Marius's example has taught the other medicae officers that their responsibility is to focus on their work, not distract the Lord Captain with inane fantasies."

traits.locale_text: “我很感激您对他的严格要求。马吕斯的事情给其他船医树立了榜样，大家都意识到自己的职责是专心工作，而不是天天胡说八道，分散舰长大人的注意力。”
“我很感激您对他的严格要求。马吕斯的事情给其他船医树立了榜样，大家都意识到自己的职责是专心工作，而不是天天胡说八道，分散舰长大人的注意力。”

languages.text: "Ona karşı {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}katı{/d} olduğunuz için mutluyum. Marius, diğer sıhhiye subaylarına sorumluluklarının çalışmalarına odaklanmak olduğunu ve Lord Kaptan'ı budalaca fantezilerle rahatsız etmemeleri gerektiğini öğretti."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate that you were {d|Encyclopedia:MariusNotPilgrim}strict{/d} with him. Marius's example has taught the other medicae officers that their responsibility is to focus on their work, not distract the Lord Captain with inane fantasies."
